name: Seafood Bu Rini
address: Jl. Tukad Punggawa No.27, Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80229, Indonesia
review 1: Warung Bu Rini, nestled in Serangan, South Denpasar, is a seafood sanctuary that delights the senses. The fish, fresh from the ocean, is cooked to perfection, with spices that seep deep into every flaky layer. Easy parking and a location that's simple to find make the visit hassle-free. It's a place where the flavors of Bali come alive, offering a taste that's as rich as the island's culture. A meal here isn't just food; it's a journey through the best of Balinese seafood, one that's sure to leave you craving more.üê†üç≤
review 2:
This restaurant is recommended by many local residents. Apart from the advantages obtained from the freshness of the raw ingredients, the chili sauce served is also very appetizing. We tried the steamed fish and Sauce Padang clams. We like everything.

However, there still needs to be improvements in terms of service to make it more alert and friendly. apart from that everything is as expected.
review 3:
It was one of my favorite local seafood restaurants in Bali a few years ago. However, during my last visit, I was a bit disappointed.

First, regarding cleanliness, I found a cockroach that came from under the plate on the table, and my wife found dead flies in our white rice. These two incidents probably ruined my appetite that day.

Second, regarding taste, as I remembered, the sensation, freshness, and seasoning were way better a few years ago. They were still quite good, but not as good as before.

Third, regarding access to get there at night, it was darker and had become more silent than before.

Overall, the taste was okay but not as special as before.
review 4:
Great Seafood place at Serangan island Bali. First time come but were very surprised with the quality of food, place is busy, food all delicious and had a great sambalüëå
Had a lobster and Grouper all grill to perfection, fried squid were also crispy while the meat are tender. Recomended. üëçüëç
review 5: All material is fresh (live lobster ü¶û/ live fish üêü / etc) and cooks with care, with addition Balinese sambal (for the price depends on what you eat)

name: Sentosa Seafood Serangan Bali
address: Jl. Tukad Punggawa No.3, Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali, Indonesia
review 1:
First time here.. recommended by one of my Balinese friend.
Food presentation is nice.. taste is great..
Except for the Soft Shell Crab.. which is better at my city Balikpapan. The lotus is so yummy till I order for the second time. Mamak Noodle is so yummy. You should try..
Overall they have big parking area and there are VIP rooms with minimal order that you can book and they offer Karaoke there.
Its great to bring group of team for dine in here. But you need to limit the order, otherwise with their small portion.. it will cost very expensive in the end.
review 2:
Nice and cozy restaurant to have a seafood lunch or dinner with family or a group of friend. It does not offer great view or anything, but a decent place to eat, and they have an ample amount of parking space.

The foods, however, are the stars of this place. Fresh and tasty, just the perfect requirements for a seafood restaurant. Even the side dishes were delicious.

Recommended!
review 3: Had the seafood fried rice after visiting the turtle museum next door. The food is average for the price. They got a chilli station but I dunno what they are.
review 4:
Very nice seafood restaurant. You can pick from their open aquarium.
Delicious, my recommends are the lobsters and the fried fish.
review 5: The place is very spacious, there are indoor, outdoor and VIP rooms which are separated into several rooms.  All the food is delicious, fresh and feels exclusive.  My recommendation is fried shrimp and squid, very seasoned and sprinkled with lots of fried garlic, the stir-fried vegetables are very smoky and crunchy, cooked briefly over high heat.  They hv lot of great photo spots too.  But unfortunately the road to the restaurant starting from the Serangan intersection is rather dark, there are no street lights, the side is a river but there is no safety on the side, so it's a bit risky when driving at night.

name: Dermaga Serangan ·¨§·≠Ç·¨É·¨´·¨ï·¨≤·≠Ç·¨≠·¨ó·¨¶·≠Ñ·≠ü‚Äã
address: dermaga, Jl. Tukad Punggawa, Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80229, Indonesia
review 1: Nice place many boats and a place to have a swim
review 2:
It's a government-run ferry pick-up/drop point. You get the motor boat to Nusa Penida and Nusa dua from here. It will take 40min approximately. Generally not so crowded. This property doesn't have very good washrooms and changing rooms. Local vendors may bother you sometimes. Reach here by 9 am otherwise, you will miss the ferry. Very limited ferry services are there. Carry your prescribed medicines for sea sickness. It's not a very fun ride. Waves and rocking rides may make you sick.

Peoples are so helpful and photogenic
review 3: Its government run ferry pick-up/drop point. You get motor boat to nusa penida and nusa dua from here. It will take 40min approximately. Generally not so crowded. This property don't have very good washrooms and changing rooms. Local vendors may bother you sometimes. Reach here by 9 am otherwise you will miss the ferry. Very limited ferry services are there. Carry your prescribed medicines for sea sickness. It's not very fun ride. Waves and rocking ride may make you sick. Ping me for planning itinerary to Bali.
review 4: Our speed boat from Lembongan suppose to Sanur. The captian reroute due to low tide at Sanur. So we are here to see this beautiful pier. Simply the photos can tell this is a nicer pier....
review 5: Small coral beach in busy Harbour estuary. A nice place to see traditional ships and boats too. Lots of sea food places to eat at.

name: ESA-G & Bali Line Cruise Office
address: Jl. Tukad Punggawa, Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80229, Indonesia
review 1: Worse experience. Extremely rude and inconsiderate staff. Ship is like a slave dungeon. Inside is a puke fest. It will be the worst hours of your life. Wouldn't wish it on my enemies! Try to avoid if you can.
review 2: It was hot and we walked a lot. Many of the beaches are rocky and only one small beach that you can swim. We took good pictures but it's not worth it I regret going. ( four beaches tour)

name: Warung Pan Bobby
address: Jl. Tukad Punggawa pantai melasti, Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80229, Indonesia
review 1:
Best seafood I've had in Indonesia, make sure you get the Paket Gila seafood. Everything was delicious, couldn't recommend this enough! We had lunch here and ended up going back for dinner. Our meal was 85,000 and enough for two to share, absolute bargain.
The restaurant had a great view of the beach too.
review 2: The place is comfortable, cool, and clean. The service is also fast and friendly. The food tastes delicious, especially the grilled prawns. I really want to come back üòò
review 3:
I like the seafood items here.
They have fish, prawn, squid, fish soup, water spinach stir fry, etc.

You can arrange like a party here! birthday party or meetings.
review 4: The seafood is not fresh and overpriced.

name: The agus seafood resto
address: Jl. Tukad Punggawa No.25, Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80229, Indonesia
review 1: Basic food (fried rice, club sandwich) but tasty and reasonably priced. Friendly staff, same as everywhere!
review 2: 75 lights but no fans. Really? Tone deaf to westerners much? Sauna.

name: Paras paros marina lodge
address: Jl. Tukad Punggawa No.123, banjar ponjok, Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80229, Indonesia
review 1: Clean room and good location to catch an early ferry as it is 3mn walking from the boarding dock. But staff constantly tries to charges extra and refuses credit cards (??!)
review 2:
This is hotel is definitely a "wow" one. The dishes are outstanding: We order breakfast and dinner at the hotel and none of them are disappointing. The front desk are so friendly and very helpful. The room is spacious and surprisingly clean! The bathroom is a bit small, but it's not a hassle at all.

One of the best point from this hotel is the bar during night. You can enjoy food and beverages with cheap price (Yes, it's cheap, far cheaper than any f&b in any other hotels) but great taste (for indonesian people tongue fyi, so you know what you'll get)! Recommended place for family or couple to spend the night.
review 3: Came to the rooftop restaurant for sunset and it was amazing! Beautiful view of the sunset, sailing boats and jukung. I love the burger and the price is affordable. There is an entrance fee IDR 30K per person includes one drink.
review 4: I do really love this place. The cafe was amazing with such a view, sea view with a lot of ship and boat. The music really good, luv the song and the dj. Fasilitation here so clean, such as toilet, sink and everythingüëçüëç but the food not too many variant, Its gonna be best choices if we can order fish as the main course because the place near sea.
review 5: We love this place, great food, cheerful and friendly stuff. We were on the rooftop for having sunset and it was stunning view from the top to see the harbor and ocean, exceptional for the delay food and they give us a compliments meal for it. Definitely we will comeback again!

name: Wr Pak Syukur Ikan Bakar Muslim
address: Jl. Tukad Bulan, Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80229, Indonesia
review 1: Love the food here! Everything taste sooo good at a very reasonable price
review 2:
Great place to have seafood amongst the other resto at Serangan island.
The only muslim restaurant there, so no need to worry if you crave for halal food.

The taste is great, the price are reasonable. Two thumbs up for pak Syukur!
review 3: If you‚Äôre in the area, do go have a meal there. We ordered the grilled fish, crab saos Padang, fried calamari, plecing kangkung. It was all good and their sambal is great. Place was clean and chill. Staff were nice. See photos on my Insta @diningduo
review 4: Good place,  amazing taste,  excellent service... The important things are clean and organize well
review 5: Loooove their menu. The fish and squid grilled with delicious spices, their sambal also both are perfect match. They have fried lime tomato sambal and Chopper lemongrass sambal. You have to try this. Really recommend this and I definitely come again.

name: Pim'a Garden
address: Jl. Tukad Punggawa No.96 2nd Floor, Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80229, Indonesia
review 1: I was so impressed with how beautiful the room of this homestay was. The bed in particular was probably the most comfortable of my month-long trip. The terrace offers a great view. But most of all, the family was so friendly, welcoming and did everything they could to get me a speedboat to the Gili Islands (they drove me over an hour to the nearest port). Highly Recommended.
review 2:
Gorgeous little find right alongside the Serangan Harbour.
Perfect little stop over before our ferry ride to Gili T.
Cheap but beautifully appointed homestay with delightful hosts and good internet.
review 3:
Local and tasty food! Must go place for relaxing lunch with view.
Service is good, the girls are attentive, and we met Ibu before leaving. We will be back üëç
review 4: Stayed overnight in their home share and had a great breakfast. The accommodation was excellent. Beautiful room with a view and our hosts were lovely and generous. It was a 5 minute walk to our ferry in the morning which was perfect. Would highly recommend staying here if you‚Äôre in the area.
review 5: Great food and great service plus a really nice view. The women who ran it were absolutely lovely!

name: El Moana
address: 76HP+FH5, Jl. Tukad Punggawa, Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80229, Indonesia

name: D' Paon Manggis
address: Jl. Tukad Punggawa No.94, Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80229, Indonesia
review 1:
Amazing service, fresh seafood and friendly staffs! We got to pick our fish, went for the snapper and grilled! Ordered lobster, prawns and water spinach as a side dish! My baby was fussing as he was feeling sleepy and ayu asked me if I wanted help..that was so kind of her! He was still crying as he's also teething but the gesture alone was more than appreciated! All the women there were amazing! If you're a mother/parent and reading this. I am sure you can relate..that alone deserves a 5 star review!

Thank you for the great food and friendly service üòä
review 2:
Makanannya enak bgt!
- Most recomended: cumi tepung, kerang suna cekuh, ikan bakar!
Everything was so good, even their ice tea.
I spent my money there to celebrate ma birthday and it was really worth.
So, if you want to eat any seafood, this place is recomended, worth to try!
I ordered some foods: ikan bakar, kerang suna cekuh, cumi tepung, plecing kangkung, 2 plates of rice, 2 cups of ice tea and I only paid for about 167K.
The view also was so good. We could see sunset here as well
review 3: Great seafood taste with affordable price.  Good value
review 4:
THE SERVICE: 100

CRAB SOUP: 100

Bu Rini is just too mainstream for me. Sorry. But this restaurant deserve better. Go try it! You won‚Äôt regret.
review 5: Very nice, fresh seafood with a view of the harbour. We were the only people here in the afternoon. Doesn't seem very touristic. Affordable prices

name: Dermaga Seafood Harbour Êµ∑ÈÆÆÊ∏Ø
address: Jl. Tukad Punggawa No.44, Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80223, Indonesia
types: seafood_restaurant, market, wholesaler, restaurant, food, store
review 1:
NOT RECOMMENDED! Dirty, Expensive and No taste
Our visit to this Resto left us unimpressed. The slow service, frozen seafood, and the need to ask for basic items like plates and cutlery made it a less-than-pleasant experience. The prices, considering the quality, felt too high!! 25k for small plastic of Sprite! Warung kotor harga hotel üëéüëé üëéüëé
review 2: Slow service , the taste was not good, and bit costly.we ordered 1 portion of squid and a small fish, 2 plates of rice and kangkung for Rp 254.000
review 3:
Food and the view was goodüòÉ
recomended!!!

name: Mancing keramba pan hiro
address: Jl. Tukad Punggawa No.112, Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80229, Indonesia

name: WARUNG MALONE
address: Jalan Tukad Punggawa III No. 122, Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80229, Indonesia
review 1:
warung malone has great grilled condiments, grilled scallops with lime leaves and the best grilled prawns in Serangan.  prices that are friendly to local tourists and excellent service.

For service : not the quality of restaurant service, but the quality of a mother's cooking.  delicious memories!

For location and view : awesome  üëå
review 2: Best place in Serangan.Have known Wayan and Malon for many years .Do yourself a favour and visit Warung Malone.
review 3: Best lunch spot in Serangan. The owner, Pak Komang, is a really friendly guy who remembers everyone by name.
review 4:
Very good local warung with locally caught seafood.
Portions a bit small, but so is the price - so order up.
review 5: Very good food and service, will definitely come back with more friends and family! Highly recommend!!

name: Warung Yuki
address: Jl. Tukad Punggawa No.I, Serangan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80229, Indonesia
review 1:
Doing the tourist thing and found this little beauty!! Very attentive / friendly staff with excellent English, very clean and well maintained facilities. Decided to order one of every ‚Äòseafood‚Äô option from the menu üòÅ to try with the view! The food was absolutely amazing & fresh! some of the best seafood eaten in Bali 10/10.
Would highly recommend YUKI Warung .
review 2: This place is as close to perfect as it comes!  It's location is perfect, right on a busy working harbour.  The staff are perfect - great attitudes, they really want to see their customers are completely happy.  And you can't beat their seafood - the fish, crabs and lobsters are alive in tanks and in great health - and their cooks are experts.  A great experience at a really great price.  Highly recommended.
review 3: Relaxed modern lunch experience in quaint seaside village. Great food with good sized portions. Recommend to stop here during a visit to the local turtle conservation centre. Recommended!
review 4: Great restaurant with seaview, fresh seafood served at very good price. Staff is very friendly too! Our 2yo son really enjoyed too! Highly recommend this warung.
review 5: Amazing seafood meal !! And fantastic service 10/10 can‚Äôt fault it will definitely be back.

name: Serangan sport's bar
address: 76GQ+VJF, Jl. Tukad Punggawa, Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80229, Indonesia
review 1: My husband eats everything but I am vegetarian, so before entering, we asked if they served anything vegeterian, they said yes. When we got the menu, they had nothing vegetarian. When we ordered, the waitress repeated our order, to make sure it's correct. Than they told me they will make me a pad thai without meat or fish. When we got our food it was different from what we ordered. My husband got a different dish than from the one he ordered and with my VEGETARIAN pad thai, I got shrimp chips on the side... üòî portions were very small and I don't even eat a lot. It's clear this place just wants to get you in, but doesn't care about your wishes...
review 2: Fish and chips were great. Had a great time singing karaoke with the locals. Rats were chill
review 3: While we were waiting, we saw a rat that seemed to be at home. The food was horrible. They let us see the fish and chose what we wanted. We took an indonesian "lobster" and a fish. When it arrived, the very strange "lobster" was almost empty; basically, there was nothing  to eat at all. Then the fish came. We asked for no spice, but it still came with spice. The drinks tasted weird. The rice was plain. And it was super expensive, for an empty "lobster", a not so tasty fish, an ice tea that tasted weird and the smallest portion of plain rice. It was the worst lunch we ever had of our trip. I strongly recommend you never to  go eat there.
review 4: Worst lunch of my life. Very surprised it had good reviews and was recommended. Rats on the ceiling, poor food quality, expensive for little portions of food and waiting 10 mins for the change. You say no spice they put spice on the fish and give some spice with it, not many choices to pick from and their "indonisian lobster" we took had nothing in it. Drinks tasted really bad. I had the worst stomach ache afterwards. I do not recommend it at all.
review 5: Ask for an ice cold Bintang

name: Warung pak jalan
address: 76HQ+C6G, Jl. Tukad Punggawa, Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80229, Indonesia
review 1: I love the chicken Balinese curry from Warung pak jalan.. it‚Äôs delicious. We‚Äôve tried the Nasi Goreng, Chicken curry and French fries and the presentation and quality of ingredients has been excellent. Definitely worth a visit to experience the menu and take away is also available.
review 2: Had curry, sweet and sour chicken and some fries. Top quality food, right on the waters edge.  Highly recommended.
review 3: This is a very nice local warung. Komang is a trustworthy and honest man.  The food is great, as are the beers. You'll be charged local prices, no hassles.
review 4: Delicious food with affordable price, and great service from Pak Komang, worth it to try and enjoy your beach view and sunset
review 5: Cool friendly family spot straight on the water front. Go here!

name: Villa Tepi Segara
address: Jl. Tukad Punggawa No.95, Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80229, Indonesia
review 1: Our large family stayed at this villa it was so spacious and had so many beautiful touches which made us feel at home.  It was so close to the action and in such a quiet area the hosts were very accommodating and having staff clean the villa daily was such a nice touch especially for a large family.  For the price we were so happy and would recommend it to anyone!
review 2: this 7 bedroom private villa (SooBali Tepi Segara) has an amazing rooftop view! clean and huge
review 3: Relaxing villa with sunset and sunrise view on marina, 7 bedroom villa with private pool is the best way for family holiday
review 4:
Villa is very clean
Nice view
Staf full helping and kindness
review 5: Modern villa but too bad it is close to dump area

name: Warung bu rini pak polos
address: Jl. Tukad Punggawa No.238, Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Kota Denpasar, Bali 80229, Indonesia

name: Mama Mega Guest House
address: Serangan, Denpasar Selatan, Denpasar City, Bali 80229, Indonesia
